description:
An extra layer for high output activities, from alpine approaches, backcountry tours or mountain runs that require added protection, the Coefficient LT Hybrid Vest is a stretchier, lighter version of our popular Coefficient fleece.

A lightweight layer built to keep the core warm on backcountry tours or mountain runs that require added protection, Coefficient LT Hybrid Vest boasts a breathable, woven front panel of Primaloft insulation while the Polartec® Power Grid® fleece with a gridded interior increases wicking performance and adds breathability.
name: Black Diamond Coefficient LT Hybrid Vest - Mens
